segments.text: My gaze shifts to the left, where a young boy is causing some mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's precariously balanced on a two-step stool, reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks incredibly unstable; its legs are splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see it tilting backward, almost certainly about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand deep inside a "COOKIE JAR" that's completely full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With his other hand, he's holding a plate, perhaps to catch his illicit treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors frame his mischievous little figure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on his sugary prize, completely unaware of the danger beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm genuinely worried he's going to tumble backward any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a risky maneuver just for a cookie!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is ripe for a crash, both literally and figuratively.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can only imagine the sound of that stool hitting the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR
